### pysureau_init

>  pysureau_init (path:Optional[str]=None)

<colgroup>

<tr>
<td>path</td>
<td>Optional</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>Path where the pysureau folders and files will be stored</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

#### **Example: **

``` python
pysureau_init("/tmp")
```

    pysureau project created at /tmp/pysureau_project_a50b521e-dce3-4c4f-8a5f-04304a83f93a
